text: thæ̂cring mī h̄mū̀ chnk lùm h̄nụ̀ng cāk pwng b̀āw k̄hxng reā phwk k̄heā kl̀āw ẁā “k̄ĥā tæ̀ phracêā k̄hxng reā phwk reā dị̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā t̀x phraxngkh̒ k̄hx phraxngkh̒ thrng pord xp̣hạythos̄ʹ h̄ı̂ kæ̀ reā læa thrng mettā t̀x reā d̂wy læa phraxngkh̒ th̀ān thèānận thrng pĕn p̄hū̂ mettā thī̀ dī yìng”
